S

screen - Variable in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.history.HistoryClosure
Screen to store and associate with the page name so that it can be loaded if necessary
ScreenManager - Class in com.eduworks.ec.framework
View Manager child class that manages loading "screen"s and saving screen history.
ScreenManager() - Constructor for class com.eduworks.ec.framework.ScreenManager
 
setDefaultScreen(EcScreen) - Static method in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.ScreenManager
Sets the application default Screen that is shown if no startup screen has been defined.
showModal(EcModal, Callback0) - Static method in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.ModalManager
Sets the current modal and then shows it by calling the modals display function
showOverlay(EcOverlay, Boolean) - Static method in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.OverlayManager
Set's the current overlay, then show's it by calling the display function and unhiding the overlay container.
showView(EcView, String, Callback0) - Static method in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.ViewManager
Relates the view to a DOM Selector and calls the view's display function to populate the inner html of the DOM Selector Element
startupOverlay - Static variable in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.OverlayManager
Used if one of the startupOverlayCallbacks decides that it should be displayed on startup (usually using the URL to check what should be displayed on start)
startupScreen - Static variable in class com.eduworks.ec.framework.ScreenManager
Screen to be set by application if it notices that a certain screen should be loaded on startup that is different from the default Screen
